title: Drainer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Inspect. You will learn if they are suspicious or not.
- At night, Rig someone's house. If they would be attacked, you increase the attacker's power by one stage and make it a rampage.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can't use the same ability two nights in a row.
- Retain your Background upon being converted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.
